entry.source: 〉 The people of the Eastern Kingdom of{F801}Mikado are no longer here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The people of the Eastern Kingdom of{F801}Mikado are no longer here...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reserved Monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403702}Ah, {F843,0}. You are still here{F801}in Mikado?{F801}{F802}Once I am sure that I haven't overlooked{F801}anything here, I'll be on my way at once{F801}for Tokyo.{F801}{F802}I shall see you again in Shinjuku,{F801}I trust.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Reserved Monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403702}Ah, {F843,0}. You are still here{F801}in Mikado?{F801}{F802}Once I am sure that I haven't overlooked{F801}anything here, I'll be on my way at once{F801}for Tokyo.{F801}{F802}I shall see you again in Shinjuku,{F801}I trust.{F801}
